interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: David Leadbetter From Beginner to Winner
Review Date: 2009/08/11
Store: David Leadbetter  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Special Interests
Product Description: ['David Leadbetter, renowned for working with the world\x92s top golfers including Michelle Wie, Ernie Els and Nick Price has designed a DVD aimed at improving a novice\x92s game. Computer graphics have been combined with footage taken from all the key angles, to give the clearest possible understanding of the golf swing and how to correct common faults. Also covered are the essential components of the swing set-up, grip, posture, and alignment. By teaching you the fine art of pitching, chipping, bunker play and putting, Leadbetter instructs you on how to cut shots off your score when you are close to the green. Good course tactics are imperative to playing good golf. Key areas covered include developing a routine, picking strategic targets, club selection and "swing thoughts".']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'David Leadbetter', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 2.56 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 25, 2005', 'Actors': 'David Leadbetter', 'Studio': 'Well Go USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I never golfed and it helped me alot, I still watch it after 3 months, very helpful tips.
Review Title: DVD Golf for Beginners
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

['David Leadbetter, renowned for working with the world\x92s top golfers including Michelle Wie, Ernie Els and Nick Price has designed a DVD aimed at improving a novice\x92s game. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: Strong interest in golf education and skill improvement, particularly for beginners. 
- **Learning Style**: Prefers visual learning through instructional videos that combine graphics and practical demonstrations.
- **Feedback Trend**: Positive reception of educational content; values practical tips that lead to noticeable improvement.
- **Engagement**: Actively seeks resources to enhance skills, indicating a commitment to personal development within hobbies.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to rate highly (5.0 rating for the product), suggesting a satisfaction with learning materials that effectively meet their needs.
- **Continuity**: Engages with content multiple times ("still watch it after 3 months"), indicating a preference for long-term learning resources.

This user is likely to continue exploring educational materials, particularly in sports, that offer practical advice and visual instruction.
